squidpony.squidgrid

Interface SGImageBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SGBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiImageSGBlock, SingleImageSGBlock

    public interface SGImageBlock
extends SGBlock
    An extension to SGBlock that supports direct image data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Adds the image to the end of the list of images to be shown.
      void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Sets the image to be the provided one.
      void setImages(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> images)
      Sets the list of images to be displayed to the provided list.

      • Methods inherited from interface squidpony.squidgrid.SGBlock

        getImage, getNextImage, getSize

    • Method Detail

      • setImage

        void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Sets the image to be the provided one. This will make the block hold only this single image and override all other image data the block previously held.
        Parameters:
        image -

      • addImage

        void addImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Adds the image to the end of the list of images to be shown.
        Parameters:
        image -

      • setImages

        void setImages(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> images)
        Sets the list of images to be displayed to the provided list. This overwrites any previous image information in the block.
        Parameters:
        images -
